title: SEGREGATION
fullText:
Where PV d.c. circuits are installed near other non PV d.c. cables, they shall be effectively segregated from each other. Effective segregation can be achieved by separation of 50 mm or greater.
Where PV d.c. circuits are installed within 50 mm of other non PV d.c. cables, at least one cable shall be segregated by a medium duty insulating wiring enclosure.
